```{r setup}
library(datelife)
```

To query DateLife's chronogram database, taxon names provided as input are processed and matched to the  Open Tree of Life taxonomy (OTT). To create a DateLife query, we use the function `make_datelife_query()`. In this vignette we present some usage examples of this function.

## A. When `input` is not a phylogeny

```{r}
make_datelife_query(input = "Canis")

make_datelife_query(input = rep("Canis", 10))
```
